name: Center (Hive Mind)
description:
You must protect the Center Use your cursor to repel incoming asteroids, by pushing them or releasing shockwaves.

Center is a casual arcade game where you only use your mouse to play. It's played in waves, getting progressively harder, with shops in between. You win by getting to Wave 10.

Hello! This is my first ever game project, I'm trying to start small as is recommended and decided to release my first game to have a sense of progress and keep myself motivated.

I'm studying Unity a lot and hope to be back with more releases, thank you for visiting!
